content: --- title: Flight Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-09-17T08:16:50.359Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:33:44.314Z --- # Flight Leg Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | udorLocal | `'date'` | Date of origination in local timezone | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc.| | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons.| | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | suffix | `'string'` | Suffix code | | callCode | `'string'` | Short call sign | | departureAirport | `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | rescheduledDepartureAirport | `'string'` | Rescheduled departure airport | | rescheduledArrivalAirport | `'string'` | Rescheduled arrival airport | | serviceType | `'string'` | Code differentiating charter, regular or transfer flights | | scheduledOffBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled off block time in UTC | | scheduledInBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled in block time in UTC | | estimatedOffBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Estimated off block time in UTC | | estimatedOffBlockTimeLocal | `'datetime'` | Estimated off block time in local timezone | | estimatedInBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Estimated in block time in UTC | | actualOffBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Actual off block time in UTC | | actualInBlockTime | `'datetime'` | Actual in block time in UTC | | scheduledTakeOffTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled take off time in UTC | | scheduledTakeOffTimeLocal | `'datetime'` | Scheduled take off time in local timezone | | scheduledLandingTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled landing time in UTC | | scheduledLandingTimeLocal | `'datetime'` | Scheduled landing time in local timezone | | estimatedTakeOffTime | `'datetime'` | Estimate
